Navajo Code Talkers saved countless lives; their service to our nation must never be forgotten. I am deeply saddened to hear of the passing of Sen. Pinto, who I was humbled to meet last year. My thoughts are with the Navajo Nation as they mourn. #AZ01 http://bit.ly/2K0RkrX

The brave members of our Armed Forces have served our nation w/ honor, & deserve our support when they transition to civilian life. This week, I voted to pass 9 bills to address deficiencies at the VA & provide resources to vets & their families. #AZ01  http://bit.ly/2YMf0EE
Next Thursday, I'm hosting a Coffee with your Congressman event to hear directly from you about issues affecting your community. I hope you can stop by. Details below: pic.twitter.com/rDFvy9AKcJ

Next week, I am hosting several town hall meetings across southern #AZ01. I look forward to taking your questions and hearing your thoughts and concerns. Details: pic.twitter.com/XuXGAWZNgv

The Grand Canyon contributed more than $1 billion to #AZ01's economy last year, & supports nearly 20,000 jobs. I'm committed to protecting this natural wonder from activities like uranium mining so Americans can enjoy its beauty for generations to come. http://bit.ly/2Ew2Ec2

Today, I honored the life and legacy of a hero. Navajo Code Talker Fleming Begaye passed away earlier this month at his home in Chinle. During World War II, he fought in some of the bloodiest battles in the Pacific Theater. Join me in remembering his service to our nation. #AZ01 pic.twitter.com/DWCUeD7Hnj

Improving the flexibility of conservation programs is critical to ensuring DCP agreements are implemented in #AZ01. I'm pleased we were able to address this issue and secure funding, not only for my constituents in Pinal County, but for all Arizonans. http://bit.ly/2YJq6Kk

Water is the lifeblood of #AZ01 communities, & without it, economic growth is stalling. This legislation gives the Hualapai Tribe access to water from the Colorado River, & allows Peach Springs & Grand Canyon West to create good-paying jobs in the area. http://bit.ly/2WZcVVh

May is National Water Safety Month. Drownings by kids in AZ are nearly double the natl average, & drowning is the leading preventable cause of death among kids 1-4 years old. This summer, I urge you to familiarize yourself w/ water safety practices. #AZ01 http://bit.ly/2VWO1ce

#AZ01 veterans have faithfully served our country, & they deserve to be recognized, regardless of rank.  I cosponsored the Full Military Honors Act of 2019 to ensure that all former POWs and Medal of Honor Recipients receive a full military honors burial ceremony w/ an escort. pic.twitter.com/5KrEr0pTvy

The next generation of telecom will revolutionize our economy & it's important that rural areas like #AZ01 have access. I joined my colleagues to intro legislation to address risks associated w/ deployment of new tech & ensure we remain a world leader. http://bit.ly/2JWvoOy

Congratulations on your graduation, Abbi. #AZ01 is proud of your accomplishments.

And great video work, @AlexSchillerSDM! https://twitter.com/abbijackson15/status/1130692650116370432 …

Today, I voted for 9 bills that address deficiencies at the VA & provide critical resources to vets & their families. I'm committed to ensuring #AZ01 vets receive quality care regardless of their zip code, & will continue working to get the job done. http://bit.ly/2HMRvnZ

Today marks the 100th anniversary of the House passage of the 19th amendment, giving women the right to vote. I hope you’ll join me in celebrating the women that worked to bring about this right for others, like AZ’s own France Willard Munds. #AZ01 http://bit.ly/2JvvaOX

Congratulations to Yasmin Zuch, current Georgetown University student from #AZ01, who received a Udall Undergraduate Scholarship to pursue specialized education to improve the health of Native communities. Read more about Yasmin: http://bit.ly/2VCGgDl

Community health centers are critical to the health & wellbeing of #AZ01, especially in rural areas, & we must ensure they have the funding they need to continue their mission. I intro'd the CHIME Act to extend the Community Health Centers Fund for 5 years http://bit.ly/2HINvHv

Health care costs are rising &  #AZ01 families are paying the price. Last week, we took action to lower Rx costs, restrict junk insurance plans that harm many w/ pre-existing conditions, & invest in programs to ensure consumers  access to affordable care. http://bit.ly/2LVqCUb

I offer my congratulations to Yanera Jackson, #AZ01 senior at the Coolidge Alternative Program (CAP), who was accepted to 6 universities. CAP is an innovative program helping students who might otherwise struggle in a traditional classroom to graduate. http://bit.ly/30lQQT2

Every child in America deserves a safe environment in which they can learn and grow, but in many rural areas that is not the reality. Last week, I met with Red Rock Elementary School in #AZ01 to tour their facilities and hear about infrastructure issues they face. pic.twitter.com/7XZPhKz6Yk

Despite the wet winter, #AZ01 continues to face the threat of deadly wildfires. As this wildfire season begins, I urge you to visit my website for a list of facts and prevention resources: http://bit.ly/2sDyewX

Yesterday we took action to bring down the cost of prescription drugs, restrict junk insurance plans that harm Arizonans with pre-existing conditions, and invest in programs that ensure #AZ01 consumers have access to affordable health coverage. http://bit.ly/2WQMGQL

Today, I voted to pass the #EqualityAct and give LGBTQ Americans the civil rights protections they deserve. I am proud to vote for legislation that protects the rights of Americans. Discrimination of any kind has no place in our communities. #AZ01

This week we honor the brave men & women who serve & sacrifice for our communities. As a former officer, this week means a great deal to me.
